charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1101_0100_2:
Before going out to do some exploring,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] headed into town
to prepare.
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1101_0200_2: There, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] noticed a crowd of people.
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_0500_1:
I feel sorry for you. This match was over before
it began.
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_0600_1:
But still, I was hoping for a bit more of
a challenge.
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_0800_1: We’ll make you pay for this next time!
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_0900_1:
If it’s a rematch you want, I’ll accept. But no
matter how many times you challenge me, the
result will always be the same.
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_1100_1: Where are you going to strike next?
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_1200_1:
Wherever that lot may show up, I’ll come to teach
them a lesson!
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_0401_1400_1:
Yes, I was... Does that mean you missed my
magnificent match?
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_0402_1700_1:
Ah, yes... I believe that’s what they called
themselves.
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_1800_1:
I’ve been using Team Break as my opponents for
training, as a means to test my skill.
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_1900_1:
I want to see how far my training with the
old lady can take me.
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_2000_1:
That lot are convenient because they’re so easy
to find.
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_2100_1:
I’ve been going around defeating Team Break
members who’ve been messing with other
sync pairs.
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_2200_1:
However, as I’ve been stacking up victories,
it seems a rumor has started...
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_2300_1:
I’ve apparently become notorious for intervening in
battles involving Team Break members.
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_2400_1:
It would be fine if it were just a rumor, but
it seems that people have come to expect a
performance from me.
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_0301_2600_1:
How do you know where Team Break
is going to appear?
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_0302_2800_1:
How do you know where the battles
are taking place?
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_3000_1:
Gigantamax Hatterene can sense the emotions
of creatures from a distance.
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_3100_1:
I just rush to where she senses hostile emotions,
and that’s where I find these battles.
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_3200_1: As I’m gaining experience from each battle...
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_3300_1:
Hatterene is also improving her ability to
sense emotions!
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_3400_1:
However, Team Break are proving to be
somewhat lackluster opponents.
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_3500_1:
That battle just now has left me
feeling unsatisfied.
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_3600_1:
Um! ’Scuse me! You just fought Team Break for
us, right?
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_3700_1: Thank you for protecting my Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_3800_1:
Well...I suppose there may be some benefit to
continuing these battles, then.
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_3900_1:
I can’t help it if people have high expectations
of me!
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_4000_1:
In order to expand my knowledge of
Fairy-type Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_4100_1: and to improve my teamwork with my partner...
charaepi_ch0246_00_beet/2301_1201_4200_1:
I will challenge Team Break, wherever they
may appear!
